get.summary: Retrieve mRNASeq data.

parameters.description: Format of result.
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Comma separated list of gene name(s).
parameters.name: gene

parameters.description: Narrow search to one or more TCGA disease cohorts from the scrollable list.
parameters.name: cohort

parameters.description: Comma separated list of TCGA participant barcodes (e.g. TCGA-GF-A4EO).
parameters.name: tcga_participant_barcode

parameters.description: Narrow search to one or more TCGA sample types from the scrollable list.
parameters.name: sample_type

parameters.description: Narrow search to one or more sample characterization protocols from the scrollable list.
parameters.name: protocol

parameters.description: Which page (slice) of entire results set should be returned.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Number of records per page of results.  Maximum is 2000.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: Which column in the results should be used for sorting paginated results?
parameters.name: sort_by
